de.humatic.nmj
Interface NetworkMidiListener

All Superinterfaces:
NetworkMidiClient
public interface NetworkMidiListener
extends NetworkMidiClient

Listener interface for incoming Midi data. An implementing class adds itself to the listener list of a NetworkMidiInput object.
This interface extends the generic NetworkMidiClient interface. If you open a Midi port passing a class that implements NetworkMidiListener instead of only NetworkMidiClient you will automatically be registered as a listener.

Method Summary
 void midiReceived(int channel, int ssrc, byte[] data, long timeStamp)
          Called by the Midi system with a variable length byte array.
The message type (status) and eventually its Midi channel are in data[0].
 

Method Detail

midiReceived

void midiReceived(int channel,
                  int ssrc,
                  byte[] data,
                  long timeStamp)
Called by the Midi system with a variable length byte array.
The message type (status) and eventually its Midi channel are in data[0]. Please see the Midi Specification to learn about general Midi message layout.
The method's channel argument refers to the index into configured nmj channels - this is not the Midi channel!
The ssrc parameter is only of interest with RTP channels and provides information about the (RTP) originator of the data.
